籤詩版本二:
Ua hūnā ʻia nā waiwai makamae a me nā waiwai i loko.
ʻOi aku ka maikaʻi o ka kali ʻana i ka naʻauao o ke kanaka naʻauao a noho mālie.
詩意:
Huna kēia hexagram i ke kiʻi i loaʻa i ka jade.
Hiki ke hana i nā mea a pau i ka manawa kūpono.
解曰: Loaʻa i ke gula a me ka jade. ʻAʻole maopopo i ka mea e ʻimi ai. E hālāwai me kāu alakaʻi. ʻAʻole pono e hopohopo.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Nahu gula a hoʻolimalima i ka lokomaikaʻi
ʻO Cheng Yaojin ka makua kāne nāna i hoʻokumu i ka moʻokūʻauhau Tang. I kekahi lā, e hiamoe ana ʻo Rengui ma ke kuahiwi, ʻike koke ʻo ia iā Yaojin e alualu ʻia ana e kahi tigra i kona hele ʻana. .
Ua mahalo ʻo Yaojin i ka ʻoihana kaua a Rengui, hāʻawi iā ia i ka pua Jinling, a noi iā ia e komo i ka pūʻali koa.
Ua lilo ʻo Xue Rengui i pūkaua nui o ka mōʻī Tang.
聖意: E pule no kou home a me kou palekana, e pule no kou waiwai, a e kali no ka hoopaneeia o ko olua mare ana, ke keakea nei na kanaka hele wawae ma Liujia i na kihapai, ua oo ka enuhe silika, a ua pomaikai na holoholona eono, ke imi nei lakou i kanaka. , hana, a me na hoopii lehulehu. He maikai ka hele ana a nalowale na mea, loaa na ma'i akau e na kauka maikai, Pono e hoololiia na halekupapau mauna.
古人: Nahu gula a hoʻolimalima i ka lokomaikaʻi
第X籤: He kanakolukumamākolu i lanakila i ka hailona
